mapper.insert: insert into videos (title, cover, `desc`, copyright, partition_id, uid, status, created_at) values (#{title}, #{cover}, #{desc}, #{copyright}, #{partitionId}, #{uid}, #{status}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: select * from videos where uid = #{uid} order by created_at desc limit #{i}, #{size}
